title: Grisaia no Rakuen - 08 (BDrip Uncensored)
description:
Grisaia no Rakuen - 08

in English:
The Eden of Grisaia

Episode 08 BDrip Uncensored
Episode name: The Seed of Blanc Aile IV

Credits: 
Video by: [ReinForce] (from retail BD)
Subs: [HorribleSubs] (Edited by me)


Video resolution is 1280x544, 
the aspect ratio is 2:35:1 like the original aspect ratio in the retail BD's 
and that was the ratio on the previous season BD's as well (Grisaia no Kajitsu)

=======================================================

P.S. 
the "special" episodes that came with the BD's of these 
series ("Grisaia no Kajitsu" and "Grisaia no Rakuen") 
have a aspect ratio of 16:9 although they never aired on TV! strange....

=======================================================

Series Viewing Order and torrents:

1 - Grisaia no Kajitsu (The Fruit of Grisaia):
13 Episodes + 6 Specials



2 - Grisaia no Meikyuu (The Labyrinth of Grisaia):
Just 1 Episode + 1 Special



3 - Grisaia no Rakuen (The Eden of Grisaia):
10 Episodes (as of today.. only the first 8 episodes have been released uncensored)
